Patient understand potential risk benefit treatment Envarsus XR 4 . Patients receive primary secondary kidney transplant 5 . Patient receive prior treatment Envarsus XR ( LCPTacro ) currently participate Envarsus/LCPTacro study OR 6 . The treat Investigator identify patient medical necessity switch current tacrolimus treatment Envarsus XR : Investigator aware medical necessity switch related inability purchase available tacrolimus .
